title: Did Barack Obama Express Opposition to ‘Undetected, Undocumented, Unchecked’ Immigration?
subtitle: A 13-year-old quotation from the former Illinois Senator was reintroduced into public debate in the context of President Donald Trump's "zero tolerance" policy.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 2005, Senator Barack Obama expressed his opposition to "undetected, undocumented, unchecked" immigration.
